Big Rig Boom.requires: |Big Rig Boom Unlock| OR |Progressive Episode Unlock|

Sunset Fire.requires: (|Sunset Fire Unlock| AND (|Big Rig Boom Unlock| OR |Splashdown Unlock|)) OR |Progressive Episode Unlock:3|

Hit The Skids.requires: (|Hit The Skids Unlock| AND (|Big Rig Boom Unlock| OR |Sunset Fire Unlock|))OR |Progressive Episode Unlock:4|

Midway Pass.requires: (|Midway Pass Unlock| AND |Big Rig Boom Unlock| AND |Splashdown Unlock| AND |Sunset Fire Unlock| AND |Hit The Skids Unlock|) OR |Progressive Episode Unlock:5|

Threshold Break.requires: (|Threshold Break Unlock| AND |Midway Pass Unlock|) OR |Progressive Episode Unlock:6|

Cleaning Up.requires: (|Cleaning Up Unlock| AND (|Threshold Break Unlock| OR |Scorched Rubber Unlock|))OR |Progressive Episode Unlock:7|

Scorched Rubber.requires: (|Scorched Rubber Unlock| AND (|Threshold Break Unlock| OR |Cleaning Up Unlock|)) OR |Progressive Episode Unlock:8|

Boneyard Rush.requires: (|Boneyard Rush Unlock| AND (|Cleaning Up Unlock| OR |Scorched Rubber Unlock|)) OR |Progressive Episode Unlock:9|

One Last Push.requires: (|One Last Push Unlock| AND (|Boneyard Rush Unlock| OR |Scorched Rubber Unlock|)) OR |Progressive Episode Unlock:10|

Out With A Bang.requires: (|Out With A Bang Unlock| AND |Threshold Break Unlock| AND |Cleaning Up Unlock| AND |Scorched Rubber Unlock| AND |Boneyard Rush Unlock| AND |One Last Push Unlock|) OR |Progressive Episode Unlock:11|
